event.title: settled in the vicinity of Cattle Creek and in 1878

data.event: Over time other families - including Bellingham, Bradley, Edwards, Ensor, Rush and Walker - settled in the vicinity of Cattle Creek and in 1878 a school was established at Maida Hill to cater for these families.

event.title: April 1906 the railway line was extended

data.event: In April 1906 the railway line was extended from Dalby and the first land sales in Bell were in May 1906.

event.title: the first land sales in Bell were in May 1906

data.event: In April 1906 the railway line was extended from Dalby and the first land sales in Bell were in May 1906.
